item.title: 10 Things We HATE About You: 10 Overused Terms by Evangelicals ft. Pastor Nate Wright [Open Mike with Michael Thiessen]
item.description:
OPEN MIKE w/Michael Thiessen ~ March 23, 2024
On this week's show, Mike is joined by Pastor Nate Wright, the Canadian Director of the Ezra Institute, to discuss  10 overused "Christianese" terms and phrases that ought to go. 

Episode Resource: Ezra Institute: https://ezrainstitute.com; The Rebel Podcast: https://podcasts.apple.com/gb/podcast/the-rebel-podcast/id1616545798;

.
